ComicInfo.Title: Volume One
ComicInfo.Series: Edgar Allan Poe's Snifter of Terror
ComicInfo.Summary: A comedic collection of classic tales and brand new stories, adapted by comics' snarkiest talents, in this cross between Drunk History and Tales from the Crypt, all introduced by Edgar Allan Poe at his drunkest. Collecting all of the comics from the 6-issue AHOY Comics series, plus terrifying prose and poetry features.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-08 23:11:33. [CVDB721253]
ComicInfo.Writer: Hunt Emerson, Dean Motter, Brendan Mallory, Walt Shepperd, Mark Russell, Tom Peyer
ComicInfo.Penciller: Hunt Emerson, Dean Motter, Elliott Mattice, Greg Scott, Hunt Emerson, Peter Snejbjerg, Richard Williams
ComicInfo.Inker: Hunt Emerson, Alex Ogle, Elliott Mattice, Greg Scott, Hunt Emerson, Peter Snejbjerg, Richard Williams
ComicInfo.Colorist: Hunt Emerson, Julie Barclay, Julie H. Barclay
ComicInfo.Characters: C. Auguste Dupin, Duc de L'Omelette, Edgar Allan Poe, James Joyce, Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, Ligeia, Lord Alfred Douglas, Madeline Usher, Mephistopheles, Nora Barnacle, Oscar Wilde, Pluto, Roderick Usher, Rowena Trevanion, Virginia Woolf, Vita Sackville-West
ComicInfo.Locations: Baltimore, Dublin, England, Europe, Hell, Ireland, London, Maryland, North America, Washington D.C., White House
